   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_evil_coverage_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   27:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   28:          all/0, groups/0]).
   29: 
   30: -export([system_info/1, table_info/1, error_description/1,
   31:          db_node_lifecycle/1, evil_delete_db_node/1, start_and_stop/1,
   32:          checkpoint/1, checkpoint_del_table/1, table_lifecycle/1, storage_options/1,
   33:          add_copy_conflict/1, add_copy_when_going_down/1, add_copy_when_dst_going_down/1,
   34:          add_copy_with_down/1,
   35:          replica_management/1, clear_table_during_load/1,
   36:          schema_availability/1, local_content/1,
   37:          replica_location/1, user_properties/1, unsupp_user_props/1,
   38:          sorted_ets/1, index_cleanup/1,
   39:          change_table_access_mode/1, change_table_load_order/1,
   40:          set_master_nodes/1, offline_set_master_nodes/1,
   41:          dump_tables/1, dump_log/1, wait_for_tables/1, force_load_table/1,
   42:          snmp_open_table/1, snmp_close_table/1, snmp_get_next_index/1,
   43:          snmp_get_row/1, snmp_get_mnesia_key/1, snmp_update_counter/1,
   44:          snmp_order/1, subscribe_standard/1, subscribe_extended/1,
   45:          foldl/1, info/1, schema_0/1, schema_1/1, view_0/1, view_1/1, view_2/1,
   46:          lkill/1, kill/1,
   47:          record_name_dirty_access_ram/1,
   48:          record_name_dirty_access_disc/1,
   49:          record_name_dirty_access_disc_only/1,
   50:          record_name_dirty_access_xets/1,
   51:          change_table_copy_type_node_down_allowed/1,
   52:          change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed/1]).
   53: 
   54: -export([info_check/8, index_size/1]).
   55: 
   56: -define(cleanup(N, Config),
   57: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
   58: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   59: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   60:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   61: 
   62: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   63:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   64: 
   65: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   66: all() -> 
   67:     [system_info, table_info, error_description,
   68:      db_node_lifecycle, evil_delete_db_node, start_and_stop,
   69:      checkpoint, checkpoint_del_table,
   70:      table_lifecycle, storage_options,
   71:      add_copy_conflict,
   72:      add_copy_when_going_down, add_copy_when_dst_going_down, add_copy_with_down,
   73:      replica_management,
   74:      clear_table_during_load,
   75:      schema_availability, local_content,
   76:      {group, table_access_modifications}, replica_location,
   77:      {group, table_sync}, user_properties, unsupp_user_props,
   78:      {group, record_name}, {group, snmp_access},
   79:      {group, subscriptions}, {group, iteration},
   80:      {group, debug_support}, sorted_ets, index_cleanup,
   81:      {mnesia_dirty_access_test, all},
   82:      {mnesia_trans_access_test, all},
   83:      {mnesia_evil_backup, all},
   84:      {group, change_table_copy_type_node_down}].
   85: 
   86: groups() -> 
   87:     [{table_access_modifications, [],
   88:       [change_table_access_mode, change_table_load_order,
   89:        set_master_nodes, offline_set_master_nodes]},
   90:      {table_sync, [],
   91:       [dump_tables, dump_log, wait_for_tables,
   92:        force_load_table]},
   93:      {snmp_access, [],
   94:       [snmp_open_table, snmp_close_table, snmp_get_next_index,
   95:        snmp_get_row, snmp_get_mnesia_key, snmp_update_counter,
   96:        snmp_order]},
   97:      {subscriptions, [],
   98:       [subscribe_standard, subscribe_extended]},
   99:      {iteration, [], [foldl]},
  100:      {debug_support, [],
  101:       [info, schema_0, schema_1, view_0, view_1, view_2,
  102:        lkill, kill]},
  103:      {record_name, [], [{group, record_name_dirty_access}]},
  104:      {record_name_dirty_access, [],
  105:       [record_name_dirty_access_ram,
  106:        record_name_dirty_access_disc,
  107:        record_name_dirty_access_disc_only,
  108:        record_name_dirty_access_xets
  109:       ]},
  110:      {change_table_copy_type_node_down, [],
  111:       [change_table_copy_type_node_down_allowed,
  112:        change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed]}].
  113: 
  114: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  115:     Config.
  116: 
  117: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  118:     Config.
  119: 
  120: 
  121: 
  122: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  123: %% Get meta info about Mnesia
  124: 
  125: system_info(suite) -> [];
  126: system_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(all, Config),
  128:     Ns = ?sort(Nodes),
  129:     ?match(yes, mnesia:system_info(is_running)),
  130:     ?match(Ns, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(db_nodes))),
  131:     ?match(Ns, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(running_db_nodes))),
  132:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  133:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(directory)),
  134:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(log_version)),
  135:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia:system_info(schema_version)),
  136:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(tables)),
  137:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(local_tables)),
  138:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(held_locks)),
  139:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(lock_queue)),
  140:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(transactions)),
  141:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_failures)),
  142:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_commits)),
  143:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_restarts)),
  144:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(checkpoints)),
  145:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(backup_module)),
  146:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(auto_repair)),
  147:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia:system_info(dump_log_interval)),
  148:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  149:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_log_writes)),
  150:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(send_compressed)),
  151:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(max_transfer_size)),
  152:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(all)),
  153:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(backend_types)),
  154:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, Reason }} when element(1, Reason) == badarg
  155:            , mnesia:system_info(ali_baba)),
  156:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  157: 
  158: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  159: %% Get meta info about table
  160: 
  161: table_info(suite) -> [];
  162: table_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  164:     
  165:     Tab  = table_info,
  166:     Type = bag,
  167:     ValPos = 3,
  168:     Attrs = [k, v],
  169:     Arity = length(Attrs) +1,
  170: 
  171:     Schema = 
  172: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  173: 	    true -> [{type, Type}, {attributes, Attrs}, {index, [ValPos]},
  174: 		     {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}, {ext_ram_copies, [Node3]}];
  175: 	    false ->		
  176: 		[{type, Type}, {attributes, Attrs}, {index, [ValPos]},
  177: 		 {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]},
  178: 		 {ext_ram_copies, [Node3]}]
  179: 	end,
  180:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Schema)),
  181: 
  182:     Size = 10,
  183:     Keys = lists:seq(1, Size),
  184:     Records = [{Tab, A, 7} || A <- Keys],
  185:     lists:foreach(fun(Rec) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec)) end, Records),
  186: 
  187:     case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  188: 	true -> 
  189: 	    ?match(Nodes, mnesia:table_info(Tab, ram_copies));
  190: 	false ->              
  191: 	    ?match([Node3], mnesia:table_info(Tab, ext_ram_copies)),
  192: 	    ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab, ram_copies)),
  193: 	    ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab, mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_only_copies, Config)))
  194:     end,
  195:     Read = [Node1, Node2, Node3],
  196:     Write = ?sort([Node1, Node2, Node3]),
  197: 
  198:     {[ok,ok,ok], []} = rpc:multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, info_check,
  199: 				     [Tab, Read, Write, Size, Type, ValPos, Arity, Attrs]),
  200: 
  201:     ?match({atomic, Attrs}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes) end)),
  202: 
  203:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:table_info(Tab, all)),
  204: 
  205:     %% Table info when table not loaded
  206:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  207: 	   mnesia:create_table(tab_info, Schema)),
  208:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  209:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, [])),
  210:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  211:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([tab_info], 5000)),
  212:     ?match(0, mnesia:table_info(tab_info, size)),
  213:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1, Node3], [Node2]).
  214: 
  215: info_check(Tab, Read, Write, Size, Type, ValPos, Arity, Attrs) ->
  216:     ?match(true, lists:member(mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read), Read)),
  217:     ?match(Write, ?sort(mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_write))),
  218:     ?match(Mem when is_integer(Mem), mnesia:table_info(Tab, memory)),
  219:     ?match(Size, mnesia:table_info(Tab, size)),
  220:     ?match(Type, mnesia:table_info(Tab, type)),
  221:     ?match([ValPos], mnesia:table_info(Tab, index)),
  222:     ?match(Arity, mnesia:table_info(Tab, arity)),
  223:     ?match(Attrs, mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes)),
  224:     ?match({Tab, '_', '_'}, mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern)),
  225:     ok.
  226: 
  227: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  228: %% Check the error descriptions
  229: 
  230: error_description(suite) -> [];
  231: error_description(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  232:     ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  233:     Errors = [nested_transaction, badarg, no_transaction, combine_error,
  234:               bad_index, already_exists, index_exists, no_exists, system_limit,
  235:               mnesia_down, not_a_db_node, bad_type, node_not_running, 
  236:               truncated_binary_file, active, illegal
  237:              ],
  238:     ?match(X when is_atom(X), mnesia:error_description({error, bad_error_msg})),
  239:     ?match(X when is_tuple(X), mnesia:error_description({'EXIT', pid, bad})),
  240:     %% This is real error msg
  241:     ?match(X when is_tuple(X), mnesia:error_description(
  242:                               {error, 
  243:                                {"Cannot prepare checkpoint (bad reply)",
  244:                                 {{877,957351,758147},a@legolas},
  245:                                 {error,{node_not_running,a1@legolas}}}})),
  246:     check_errors(error, Errors),
  247:     check_errors(aborted, Errors),
  248:     check_errors('EXIT', Errors).
  249: 
  250: check_errors(_Err, []) -> ok;
  251: check_errors(Err, [Desc|R]) -> 
  252:     ?match(X when is_list(X), mnesia:error_description({Err, Desc})),
  253:     check_errors(Err, R).
  254: 
  255: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  256: %% Add and drop db nodes
  257: 
  258: db_node_lifecycle(suite) -> [];
  259: db_node_lifecycle(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = AllNodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  261:     Tab = db_node_lifecycle,
  262: 
  263:     Who = fun(T) ->
  264: 		  L1 = mnesia:table_info(T, ram_copies),
  265: 		  L2 = mnesia:table_info(T, disc_copies),
  266: 		  L3 = mnesia:table_info(T, disc_only_copies),
  267: 		  L4 = mnesia:table_info(T, ext_ram_copies),
  268: 		  L1 ++ L2 ++ L3 ++ L4
  269: 	  end,
  270: 
  271:     SNs = ?sort(AllNodes),
  272: 
  273:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
  274:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  275: 
  276:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(AllNodes)),
  277:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema(AllNodes)),
  278:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema(foo)),
  279:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema([foo])),
  280:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema([foo@bar])),
  281:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  282:     ?match(false, mnesia:system_info(use_dir)),
  283:     ?match([ram_copies, disc_copies, disc_only_copies], mnesia:system_info(backend_types)),
  284:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [])),
  285:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
  286:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, node(), disc_copies)),
  287:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, node(), disc_only_copies)),
  288: 
  289:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  290: 
  291:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema(AllNodes, ?BACKEND)),
  292:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(AllNodes)),
  293: 
  294:     ?match([SNs, SNs, SNs], 
  295: 	   lists:map(fun lists:sort/1,
  296: 		     element(1, rpc:multicall(AllNodes, mnesia, table_info, 
  297: 					      [schema, disc_copies])))),
  298: 
  299:     ?match({aborted, {already_exists, schema, Node2, _}},
  300:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, disc_copies)),
  301:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  302:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
  303:     ?match({aborted, {already_exists, schema, Node2, _}},
  304:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
  305:     
  306:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  307:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, disc_copies)),
  308: 
  309:     ?match([SNs, SNs, SNs], 
  310: 	   lists:map(fun lists:sort/1,
  311: 		     element(1, rpc:multicall(AllNodes, mnesia, table_info, 
  312: 					      [schema, disc_copies])))),
  313: 
  314:     %% Delete the DB 
  315: 
  316:     Tab2 = disk_tab,
  317:     Tab3 = not_local,
  318:     Tab4 = local,
  319:     Tab5 = remote,
  320:     Tab6 = ext1,
  321: 
  322:     Tabs = [Schema,
  323: 	    [{name, Tab2},  {disc_copies, AllNodes}],
  324: 	    [{name, Tab3},  {ram_copies, [Node2, Node3]}],
  325: 	    [{name, Tab4},  {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
  326: 	    [{name, Tab5},  {disc_only_copies, [Node2]}],
  327: 	    [{name, Tab6},  {ext_ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}]
  328: 	   ],
  329: 
  330:     [?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(T)) || T <- Tabs ],
  331: 
  332:     ?match({aborted, {active, _, Node2}}, 
  333: 	   mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  334: 
  335:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1])),
  336:     ?match({aborted, {node_not_running, Node1}}, 
  337: 	   mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  338: 
  339:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1],[Tab2,Tab4,Tab6])),
  340:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node2])),
  341:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  342: 
  343:     %% Check
  344:     RemNodes = AllNodes -- [Node2],
  345: 
  346:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  347:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab)),
  348:     ?match(RemNodes, Who(Tab2)),
  349:     ?match([Node3], Who(Tab3)),
  350:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab4)),
  351:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab5)),
  352:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab6)),
  353: 
  354:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab2, Node3, ram_copies)),
  355: 
  356:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node3, ram_copies)),
  357: 
  358:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
  359:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node3)),
  360:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  361:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab)),
  362:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab2)),
  363:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab3)),
  364:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab4)),
  365:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab5)),
  366: 
  367:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  368: 
  369: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  370: %% Drop a db node when several disk resident nodes are down
  371: 
  372: evil_delete_db_node(suite) -> [];
  373: evil_delete_db_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  374:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = AllNodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  375:     Tab = evil_delete_db_node,
  376: 
  377:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, AllNodes}])),
  378:     
  379:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node2, Node3])),
  380: 
  381:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  382:     
  383:     RemNodes = AllNodes -- [Node2],
  384:     
  385:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  386:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:table_info(Tab, disc_copies)),
  387:     
  388:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  389: 
  390: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  391: %% Start and stop the system
  392: 
  393: start_and_stop(suite) -> [];
  394: start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     [Node1 | _] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(all, Config),
  396: 
  397:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  398:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  399:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, start, [])),
  400:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, start, [])),
  401:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  402:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes -- [Node1], [Node1]),
  403:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes)),
  404:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  405: 
  406: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  407: %% Checkpoints and backup management
  408: 
  409: checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  410: checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  411:     checkpoint(2, Config),
  412:     checkpoint(3, Config),
  413:     ok.
  414: 
  415: checkpoint(NodeConfig, Config) ->
  416:     [Node1 | _] = TabNodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  417:     CreateTab = fun(Type, N, Ns) ->
  418:                         Tab0 = lists:concat(["local_checkpoint_", Type, N]),
  419:                         Tab = list_to_atom(Tab0),
  420:                         catch mnesia:delete_table(Tab),
  421:                         ?match({atomic, ok},
  422:                                mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{Type, Ns}])),
  423:                         Tab
  424:                 end,
  425:     CreateTabs = fun(Type, Acc) ->
  426:                          [CreateTab(Type, 1, [hd(TabNodes)]),
  427:                           CreateTab(Type, 2, TabNodes),
  428:                           CreateTab(Type, 3, [lists:last(TabNodes)])] ++
  429:                              Acc
  430:                  end,
  431:     Types = [ram_copies, disc_copies, disc_only_copies, ext_ram_copies],
  432:     Tabs = lists:foldl(CreateTabs, [], Types),
  433:     Recs = ?sort([{T, N, N} || T <- Tabs, N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]),
  434:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(R)) end, Recs),
  435: 
  436:     CpName = a_checkpoint_name,
  437:     MinArgs = [{name, CpName}, {min, Tabs}, {allow_remote, false}],
  438:     ?match({error, _}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [MinArgs])),
  439: 
  440:     MaxArgs = [{name, CpName}, {max, Tabs}, {allow_remote, true}],
  441:     ?match({ok, CpName, L} when is_list(L),
  442: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [MaxArgs])),
  443:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, deactivate_checkpoint, [CpName])),
  444: 
  445:     Args = [{name, CpName}, {min, Tabs}, {allow_remote, true}],
  446:     ?match({ok, CpName, L} when is_list(L),
  447:            rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [Args])),
  448:     Recs2 = ?sort([{T, K, 0} || {T, K, _} <- Recs]),
  449:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(R)) end, Recs2),
  450:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, deactivate_checkpoint, [CpName])),
  451: 
  452:     ?match({error, Reason1 } when element(1, Reason1) == no_exists,
  453:            mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(CpName)),
  454:     ?match({error, Reason2 } when element(1, Reason2) == badarg,
  455:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint(foo)),
  456:     ?match({error, Reason3 } when element(1, Reason3) == badarg,
  457:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{foo, foo}])),
  458:     ?match({error, Reason4 } when element(1, Reason4) == badarg,
  459:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, foo}])),
  460:     ?match({error, Reason5 } when element(1, Reason5) == badarg,
  461:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, foo}])),
  462:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, [foo@bar]}])),
  463:     ?match({error, Reason6 } when element(1, Reason6) == badarg,
  464:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{allow_remote, foo}])),
  465: 
  466:     Fun = fun(Tab) -> ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)) end,
  467:     lists:foreach(Fun, Tabs),
  468:     ?verify_mnesia(TabNodes, []).
  469: 
  470: 
  471: checkpoint_del_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  473:     [mnesia:create_table(list_to_atom("a_" ++ integer_to_list(I)), []) || I <- lists:seq(1, 1000)],
  474: 
  475:     Tabs = mnesia:system_info(local_tables),
  476: 
  477:     spawn(fun() ->
  478:                   mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, Tabs},{ram_overrides_dump, true}])
  479:           end),
  480: 
  481:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:delete_table(a_10),
  482:     %% Ensure we didn't crash
  483: 
  484:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  485:

  489: %% Get meta info about table
  490: 
  491: -define(vrl, mnesia_test_lib:verify_replica_location).
  492: 
  493: replica_location(suite) -> [];
  494: replica_location(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  495:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  496: 
  497:     %% Create three replicas
  498:     Check = fun(Tab, Schema) ->
  499: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}|Schema])),
  500: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [Node2], [Node3], Nodes)),
  501: 
  502: 		    %% Delete one replica
  503: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
  504: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [], [Node3], Nodes)),
  505: 
  506: 		    %% Move one replica
  507: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  508: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [], [Node3], Nodes)),
  509: 
  510: 		    %% Change replica type
  511: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, ram_copies)),
  512: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node2], [Node3], Nodes))
  513: 	    end,
  514:     Check(replica_location, [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]},
  515: 			     {ram_copies, [Node2]}, {disc_copies, [Node3]}]),
  516: 
  517:     Check(ext_location, [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]},
  518: 			 {ext_ram_copies, [Node2]}, {disc_copies, [Node3]}]),
  519: 
  520:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  521: 
  522: table_lifecycle(suite) -> [];
  523: table_lifecycle(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  524:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  525: 
  526:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{type, bag},
  527: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]},
  528: 					      {attributes, [rajtan, tajtan]},
  529: 					      {name, order_of_args}])),
  530:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({order_of_args, 4711})),
  531:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, already_exists},
  532: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  533:     ?match({aborted, Reason23 } when element(1, Reason23) ==already_exists,
  534: 	   mnesia:create_table([{name, already_exists},
  535: 				{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  536:     ?match({aborted, Reason21 } when element(1, Reason21) == bad_type,
  537:            mnesia:create_table([{name, bad_node}, {ram_copies, ["foo"]}])),
  538:     ?match({aborted, Reason2} when element(1, Reason2) == bad_type,
  539:            mnesia:create_table([{name, zero_arity}, {attributes, []}])),
  540:     ?match({aborted, Reason3} when element(1, Reason3) == badarg,
  541:            mnesia:create_table([])),
  542:     ?match({aborted, Reason4} when element(1, Reason4) == badarg,
  543:            mnesia:create_table(atom)),
  544:     ?match({aborted, Reason5} when element(1, Reason5) == badarg,
  545:            mnesia:create_table({cstruct, table_name_as_atom})),
  546:     ?match({aborted, Reason6 } when element(1, Reason6) == bad_type,
  547:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {ram_copies, foo}])),
  548:     ?match({aborted, Reason7 } when element(1, Reason7) == bad_type,
  549:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {disc_only_copies, foo}])),
  550:     ?match({aborted, Reason8} when element(1, Reason8) == bad_type,
  551:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {disc_copies, foo}])),
  552: 
  553:     CreateFun =
  554:         fun() -> ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
  555:                         mnesia:create_table([{name, nested_trans}])), ok
  556:         end,
  557:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(CreateFun)),
  558:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, remote_tab},
  559: 					      {ram_copies, [Node2]}])),
  560: 
  561:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, a_brand_new_tab},
  562: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  563:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({a_brand_new_tab, 4711})),
  564:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(a_brand_new_tab)),
  565:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, Reason31}} when element(1, Reason31) == no_exists,
  566:            mnesia:dirty_read({a_brand_new_tab, 4711})),
  567:     ?match({aborted, Reason41} when element(1, Reason41) == no_exists,
  568:            mnesia:delete_table(a_brand_new_tab)),
  569:     ?match({aborted, Reason9} when element(1, Reason9) == badarg,
  570:            mnesia:create_table([])),
  571: 
  572:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, nested_del_trans},
  573: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  574: 
  575:     DeleteFun = fun() -> ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
  576:                                 mnesia:delete_table(nested_del_trans)), ok end,
  577:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(DeleteFun)),
  578: 
  579:     ?match({aborted, Reason10} when element(1, Reason10) == bad_type,
  580:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, 2}])),
  581:     ?match({aborted, Reason32} when element(1, Reason32) == bad_type,
  582:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [-1]}])),
  583:     ?match({aborted, Reason33} when element(1, Reason33) == bad_type,
  584:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [0]}])),
  585:     ?match({aborted, Reason34} when element(1, Reason34) == bad_type,
  586:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [1]}])),
  587:     ?match({aborted, Reason35} when element(1, Reason35) == bad_type,
  588:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [2]}])),
  589:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  590:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [3]},
  591:                                 {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  592: 
  593:     ets:new(ets_table, [named_table]),
  594:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  595:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  596:     ets:delete(ets_table),
  597:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  598:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  599:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  600:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(ets_table, Node1, disc_only_copies)),    
  601:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  602:     
  603:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  604:
