  606: storage_options(suite) -> [];
  607: storage_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  608:     [N1,N2,N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  609: 
  610:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,foobar}]}])),
  611:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,[foobar]}]}])),
  612:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,[duplicate_bag]}]}])),
  613:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{dets,[{type,bag}]}]}])),
  614: 
  615:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [N1]},
  616: 						 {disc_only_copies, [N2]},
  617: 						 {storage_properties,
  618: 						  [{ets,[compressed]},
  619: 						   {dets, [{auto_save, 5000}]} ]}])),
  620:     ?match(true, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  621:     ?match(5000, rpc:call(N2, dets, info, [a, auto_save])),
  622:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  623:     ?match([{a,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read({a,1})),
  624:     mnesia:dump_log(),
  625:     W2C1 = [{N2, disc_only_copies}, {N1, ram_copies}],
  626:     ?match(W2C1, lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  627:     ?match(W2C1, lists:sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  628:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, N1, disc_only_copies)),
  629:     W2C2 = [{N2, disc_only_copies}, {N1, disc_only_copies}],
  630:     ?match(W2C2, lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  631:     ?match(W2C2, lists:sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  632:     ?match(undefined, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  633:     ?match(5000, dets:info(a, auto_save)),
  634:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, N1, disc_copies)),
  635:     ?match(true, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  636: 
  637:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  638: 
  639: 
  640: clear_table_during_load(suite) -> [];
  641: clear_table_during_load(doc) ->
  642:     ["Clear table caused during load caused a schema entry in the actual tab"];
  643: clear_table_during_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  644:     Nodes = [_, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  645:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(cleartab, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  646:     Tester = self(),
  647:     Bin = <<"Testingasdasd", 0:32000>>,
  648:     Fill =  fun() -> [mnesia:write({cleartab, N, Bin}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 3000)], ok end,
  649:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(Fill)),
  650: 
  651:     StopAndStart = fun() ->
  652: 			   stopped = mnesia:stop(),
  653: 			   Tester ! {self(), stopped},
  654: 			   receive start_node -> ok end,
  655: 			   ok = mnesia:start(),
  656: 			   ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([cleartab], 2000),
  657: 			   lists:foreach(fun({cleartab,_,_}) -> ok;
  658: 					    (What) -> Tester ! {failed, What},
  659: 						      unlink(Tester),
  660: 						      exit(foo)
  661: 					 end,
  662: 					 ets:tab2list(cleartab)),
  663: 			   Tester ! {self(), ok},
  664: 			   normal
  665: 		   end,
  666: 
  667:     Test = fun(N) ->
  668: 		   Pid = spawn_link(Node2, StopAndStart),
  669: 		   receive {Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
  670: 		   Pid ! start_node,
  671: 		   timer:sleep(N*10),
  672: 		   {atomic, ok} = mnesia:clear_table(cleartab),
  673: 		   receive
  674: 		       {Pid, ok} -> ok;
  675: 		       {failed, What} ->
  676: 			   io:format("Failed in ~p tries, with ~p~n",[N, What]),
  677: 			   exit({error, What});
  678: 		       {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  679: 			   exit({died, Reason})
  680: 		   end
  681: 	   end,
  682:     [Test(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  683:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  684: 
  685: 
  686: add_copy_conflict(suite) -> [];
  687: add_copy_conflict(doc) -> 
  688:     ["Verify that OTP-5065 doesn't happen again, whitebox testing"];
  689: add_copy_conflict(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2] = 
  691: 	?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  692:     
  693:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  694:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(b, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  695:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(test, [{ram_copies, [Node2]}])),            
  696:     mnesia:stop(),
  697:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start([{no_table_loaders, 1}])),
  698: 
  699:     verify_ll_queue(10),
  700: 
  701:     Self = self(),
  702:     Test = fun() ->
  703: 		   Res = mnesia:add_table_copy(test, Node1, ram_copies),
  704: 		   Self ! {test, Res}
  705: 	   end,
  706:     %% Create conflict with loader queue.
  707:     spawn_link(Test),
  708:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  709:     %% Conflict ok
  710:     mnesia_controller:unblock_controller(),
  711:     
  712:     ?match_receive({test, {atomic,ok}}),
  713:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([a,b], 3000)),
  714:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  715:     ?cleanup(1, Config).
  716: 
  717: verify_ll_queue(0) ->
  718:     ?error("Couldn't find anything in queue~n",[]);
  719: verify_ll_queue(N) ->
  720:     ?match(granted,mnesia_controller:block_controller()),
  721:     case mnesia_controller:get_info(1000) of
  722: 	{info,{state,_,true,[],_Loader,[],[],[],_,_,_,_,_,_}} ->
  723: 	    %% Very slow SMP machines haven't loaded it yet..
  724: 	    mnesia_controller:unblock_controller(),
  725: 	    timer:sleep(10),
  726: 	    verify_ll_queue(N-1);
  727: 	{info,{state,_,true,[],Loader,LL,[],[],_,_,_,_,_,_}} ->
  728: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{Loader,LL}]),
  729: 	    ?match([_], LL);  %% Verify that something is in the loader queue
  730: 	Else ->
  731: 	    ?error("No match ~p maybe the internal format has changed~n",[Else])
  732:     end.
  733: 
  734: add_copy_when_going_down(suite) -> [];
  735: add_copy_when_going_down(doc) -> 
  736:     ["Tests abort when node we load from goes down"];
  737: add_copy_when_going_down(Config) -> 
  738:     [Node1, Node2] = 
  739: 	?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  740:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  741:     %% Grab a write lock 
  742:     Tester = self(),
  743:     WriteAndWait = fun() -> 
  744: 			   mnesia:write({a,1,1}),
  745: 			   Tester ! {self(), got_lock},
  746: 			   receive continue -> ok
  747: 			   end
  748: 		   end,
  749:     Locker = spawn(fun() -> mnesia:transaction(WriteAndWait) end),
  750:     receive {Locker, got_lock} -> ok end,
  751: 
  752:     spawn_link(fun() -> Res = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, add_table_copy,
  753: 				       [a, Node2, ram_copies]),
  754: 			Tester ! {test, Res}
  755: 	       end),
  756:     %% We have a lock here we should get a timeout
  757:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  758:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  759:     ?match_receive({test,{aborted,_}}),
  760:     ?verify_mnesia([Node2], []).
  761: 
  762: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(suite) -> [];
  763: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(doc) ->
  764:     ["Table copy destination node goes down. Verify that the issue fixed in erlang/otp#6013 doesn't happen again, whitebox testing."];
  765: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(Config) ->
  766:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  767:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  768:     lists:foreach(fun(I) ->
  769:                           ok = mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write({a, I, I}) end)
  770:                   end,
  771:                   lists:seq(1, 100000)),
  772:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, [Node2])),
  773: 
  774:     %% Start table copy
  775:     Tester = self(),
  776:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  777:                        mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node2, ram_copies),
  778:                        Tester ! add_table_copy_finished
  779:                end),
  780:     timer:sleep(10),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:send_more/6` has started
  781: 
  782:     %% Grab a write lock
  783:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  784:                        Fun = fun() ->
  785:                                      ok = mnesia:write_lock_table(a),
  786:                                      Tester ! {write_lock_acquired, self()},
  787:                                      receive node2_mnesia_killed -> ok
  788:                                      end,
  789:                                      Tester ! write_lock_released,
  790:                                      ok
  791:                              end,
  792:                        mnesia:transaction(Fun)
  793:                end),
  794:     receive {write_lock_acquired, Locker} -> ok
  795:     end,
  796:     timer:sleep(200),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:send_more/6` has finished
  797:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2])),
  798:     Locker ! node2_mnesia_killed,
  799: 
  800:     receive write_lock_released -> ok
  801:     end,
  802:     receive add_table_copy_finished -> ok
  803:     end,
  804:     timer:sleep(1000),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:finish_copy/5` has acquired the read lock
  805: 
  806:     %% Grab a write lock
  807:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(a) end, 10)),
  808:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  809: 
  810: add_copy_with_down(suite) -> [];
  811: add_copy_with_down(Config) ->
  812:     %% Allow add_table_copy() with ram_copies even all other replicas are down
  813:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  814:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node3]}, {disc_copies, [Node2]}])),
  815:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  816:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  817:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  818:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node2)),
  819:     ok = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, start, []),
  820:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  821:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2], [a])),
  822:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, Node2, ram_copies)),
  823:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  824:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  825:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  826:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  827:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  828:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  829:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  830:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  831: 
  832:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node1)),
  833:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  834:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  835:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, disc_copies)),
  836:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  837:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  838:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  839:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  840:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  841: 
  842:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node1)),
  843:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  844:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  845:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  846:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  847:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  848:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  849:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  850:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  851: 
  852:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  853: 
  854: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  855: %% Add, drop and move replicas, change storage types
  856: %% Change table layout (only arity change supported)
  857: 
  858: -record(replica_management, {k, v}).
  859: -record(new_replica_management, {k, v, extra}).
  860: 
  861: -define(SS(R), lists:sort(element(1,R))).
  862: 
  863: replica_management(doc) ->
  864:     "Add, drop and move replicas, change storage types.";
  865: replica_management(suite) ->
  866:     [];
  867: replica_management(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  868:     %% add_table_copy/3, del_table_copy/2, move_table_copy/3,
  869:     %% change_table_copy_type/3, transform_table/3
  870: 
  871:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  872: 
  873:     Tab = replica_management,
  874:     Attrs = record_info(fields, replica_management),
  875: 
  876:     %%
  877:     %% Add, delete and change replicas
  878:     %%
  879:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  880:            mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, {attributes, Attrs},
  881:                                 {ram_copies, [Node1]}, {ext_ram_copies, [Node3]}])),
  882:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  883:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node1, Node3], [], Nodes)),
  884:     %% R - -
  885:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
  886:     ?match({aborted,  Reason50 } when element(1, Reason50) == combine_error,
  887: 	   mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, disc_copies)),
  888:     ?match({aborted,  Reason51 } when element(1, Reason51) == combine_error,
  889:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  890:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
  891:     SyncedCheck = fun() ->
  892: 			  mnesia:lock({record,Tab,0}, write),
  893: 			  ?match([0,0,0], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])))
  894: 		  end,
  895:     mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck),
  896: 
  897:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
  898:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  899:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node3)),
  900:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [], [], Nodes)),
  901:     %% - - -
  902:     ?match({aborted,Reason52} when element(1, Reason52) ==  no_exists,
  903:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ram_copies)),
  904: 
  905:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab},
  906: 					      {attributes, Attrs},
  907: 					      {disc_copies, [Node1]}])),
  908:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  909:     %% D - -
  910:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  911: 
  912:     ?match({aborted,  Reason53} when element(1, Reason53) == badarg,
  913:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, bad_storage_type)),
  914:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)),
  915:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  916:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  917:     %% D DO -
  918:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ext_ram_copies)),
  919:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  920:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  921:     %% D DO R
  922:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  923:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  924:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1, Node2], [Node3], [], Nodes)),
  925:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  926:     %% DO DO R
  927:     ?match({aborted,  Reason54} when element(1, Reason54) == already_exists,
  928:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ram_copies)),
  929:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  930:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [], Nodes)),
  931:     %% - DO R
  932:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  933:     ?match(Tab, ets:new(Tab, [named_table])),
  934:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  935:     ?match(true, ets:delete(Tab)),
  936:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  937:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  938:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  939:     %% D DO R
  940:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, disc_only_copies)),
  941:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2, Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  942:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  943: 
  944:     %% D DO D0
  945:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, ext_ram_copies)),
  946:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  947:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  948:     %% D DO R
  949:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  950:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, disc_copies)),
  951:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node1,Node2], Nodes)),
  952:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  953: 
  954:     %% D D R
  955:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  956:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
  957:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  958: 
  959:     %% DO D R
  960:     ?match(Tab, ets:new(Tab, [named_table])),
  961:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, ram_copies)),
  962:     ?match(true, ets:delete(Tab)),
  963:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, ram_copies)),
  964:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3,Node1], [Node2], Nodes)),
  965:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  966:     %% R D R
  967:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  968:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2,Node1], Nodes)),
  969:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  970: 
  971:     %% D D R
  972:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)),
  973:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  974:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  975: 
  976:     %% D DO R
  977:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, disc_only_copies)),
  978:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2, Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  979:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  980:     %% D DO DO
  981:     %% test clear
  982:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
  983:     mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck),
  984: 
  985:     %% rewrite for rest of testcase
  986:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  987: 
  988:     %% D DO DO
  989:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
  990:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  991:     %% D - DO
  992:     ?match({aborted,  Reason55} when element(1, Reason55) == already_exists,
  993:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  994: 
  995:     %%
  996:     %% Move replica
  997:     %%
  998:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  999:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node3], [], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1000:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
 1001:     %% - D DO
 1002:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, ext_ram_copies)),
 1003:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1004:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
 1005:     %% - D ER
 1006:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node1)),
 1007:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node1], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1008:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
 1009:     %% ER D -
 1010: 
 1011:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
 1012:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node2)),
 1013:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node3)),
 1014:     %% - D ER
 1015:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
 1016:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 43, sync_me}) end)),
 1017:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2],Nodes -- [Node3])),
 1018:     %% - D ER
 1019:     ?match({aborted,Reason56} when element(1, Reason56) == not_active,
 1020: 	   mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node1)),
 1021:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2],Nodes -- [Node3])),
 1022:     %% - D ER
 1023:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node3])),
 1024:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1025:     %% - D ER
 1026:     ?match([{Tab,43,sync_me}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,43})),
 1027:     
 1028:     %%
 1029:     %% Transformer
 1030:     %%
 1031: 
 1032:     NewAttrs = record_info(fields, new_replica_management),
 1033:     Transformer =
 1034:         fun(Rec) when is_record(Rec, replica_management) -> 
 1035: 		#new_replica_management{k = Rec#replica_management.k,
 1036: 					v = Rec#replica_management.v,
 1037: 					extra = Rec#replica_management.k * 2}
 1038:         end,
 1039:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun(R) -> R end, Attrs)),
 1040:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, NewAttrs, new_replica_management)),
 1041: 
 1042:     ERlist = [#new_replica_management{k = K, v = K+2, extra = K*2} || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1043:     ARlist = [hd(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, K)) || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1044: 
 1045:     ?match(ERlist, ARlist),
 1046: 
 1047:     ?match({aborted,  Reason56} when element(1, Reason56) == bad_type,
 1048:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, 0)),
 1049:     ?match({aborted, Reason57} when element(1, Reason57) ==  bad_type,
 1050:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, -1)),
 1051:     ?match({aborted, Reason58} when element(1, Reason58) ==  bad_type,
 1052:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, [])),
 1053:     ?match({aborted,  Reason59} when element(1, Reason59) == bad_type,
 1054:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, no_fun, NewAttrs)),
 1055:     ?match({aborted,  Reason59} when element(1, Reason59) == bad_type,
 1056:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun(X) -> X end, NewAttrs, {tuple})),
 1057: 
 1058:     %% OTP-3878 
 1059:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, ignore, 
 1060:                                                 NewAttrs ++ [dummy])),
 1061:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, ignore, 
 1062:                                                 NewAttrs ++ [dummy], last_rec)),
 1063: 
 1064:     ARlist = [hd(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, K)) || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1065:     ?match({'EXIT',{aborted,{bad_type,_}}},
 1066:            mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, #new_replica_management{})),
 1067:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {last_rec, k, v, e, dummy})),
 1068: 
 1069:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1070: 
 1071: schema_availability(doc) ->
 1072:     ["Test that schema succeeds (or fails) as intended when some db nodes are down."];
 1073: schema_availability(suite) ->
 1074:     [];
 1075: schema_availability(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1076:     [N1, _N2, N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1077:     Tab = schema_availability,
 1078:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 1079:     Def1 = [{Storage, [N1, N3]}],
 1080:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def1)),
 1081: 
 1082:     N = 10,
 1083:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> [mnesia:write({Tab, K, K + 2}) || K <- lists:seq(1, N)], ok end)),
 1084:     ?match({[N,0,N], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1085:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1086:     ?match({[N,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1087: 
 1088:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [Tab])),
 1089:     ?match({[N,0,N], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1090:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1091: 
 1092:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
 1093:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1094: 
 1095:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [Tab])),
 1096:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1097: 
 1098:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1099: 
 1100: -define(badrpc(Tab), {badrpc, {'EXIT', {aborted,{no_exists,Tab}}}}).
 1101: 
 1102: local_content(doc) ->
 1103:     ["Test local_content functionality, we want to see that correct"
 1104:      " properties gets propageted correctly between nodes"];
 1105: local_content(suite) -> [];
 1106: local_content(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1107:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config), 
 1108:     Tab1 = local1,
 1109:     Def1 = [{local_content, true}, {ram_copies, Nodes}],
 1110:     Tab2 = local2,
 1111:     Def2 = [{local_content, true}, {disc_copies, [Node1]}],
 1112:     Tab3 = local3,
 1113:     Def3 = [{local_content, true}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
 1114:     Tab4 = local4,
 1115:     Def4 = [{local_content, true}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
 1116: 
 1117:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1118:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1119:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1120:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab4, Def4)),
 1121: 
 1122:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node1}])),
 1123:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node2}])),
 1124:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node3}])),
 1125:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node1}])),
 1126:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node1}])),
 1127:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node1}])),
 1128: 
 1129:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab2), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node2}])),
 1130:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab3), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node2}])),
 1131:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab4), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node2}])),
 1132: 
 1133:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab2, Node2, ram_copies])),    
 1134:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab3, Node2, disc_copies])),
 1135:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab4, Node2, disc_only_copies])),
 1136:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1137:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1138:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1139: 
 1140:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node2}])),
 1141:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node2}])),
 1142:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node2}])),
 1143: 
 1144:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1145:     ?match([{Tab2, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1146:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1147:     ?match([{Tab4, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1148: 
 1149:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1150:     ?match([{Tab2, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1151:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1152:     ?match([{Tab4, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1153: 
 1154:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node3}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1155:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab2, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1156:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab3, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1157:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab4, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1158: 
 1159:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1160: 	   mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node3, ram_copies)),
 1161:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
 1162: 
 1163:     %% Added for OTP-44306
 1164:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1165:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, [Node3])),
 1166: 
 1167:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([Node3], [Tab1]),
 1168: 
 1169:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1170: 
 1171:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab1])),
 1172:     
 1173:     SyncedCheck = fun(Tab) ->
 1174: 			  mnesia:lock({record,Tab,0}, write),
 1175: 			  {OK, []} = rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]),
 1176: 			  OK
 1177: 		  end,
 1178:     ?match({atomic, [0,1,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab1])),
 1179:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab2])),    
 1180:     ?match({atomic, [1,0,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab2])),
 1181:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab3])),    
 1182:     ?match({atomic, [1,0,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab3])),
 1183: 
 1184:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1185: 
 1186: 
 1187: change_table_access_mode(suite) -> [];
 1188: change_table_access_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1189:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1190:     Tab = test_access_mode_tab,
 1191: 
 1192:     Def = case  mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1193: 	      true -> [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1194: 	      false -> [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1195: 			{disc_copies, [Node2]},
 1196: 			{disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
 1197: 	  end,
 1198:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
 1199: 
 1200:     Write = fun(What) -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, What}) end,
 1201:     Read = fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end,
 1202: 
 1203:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [test_ok])),
 1204:     %% test read_only
 1205:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_only)),
 1206:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [nok])),
 1207:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, [nok]})),
 1208:     ?match({aborted, _}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [nok]])),
 1209:     ?match({aborted, _}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [nok]])),
 1210:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1211:     %% test read_write
 1212:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1213:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [test_ok1])),
 1214:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok1}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1215:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [test_ok2]])),
 1216:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok2}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1217:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [test_ok3]])),
 1218:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok3}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1219: 
 1220:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1221: 
 1222:     Def4 = [{name, Tab}, {access_mode, read_only_bad}],
 1223:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _, _}}, mnesia:create_table(Def4)),
 1224: 
 1225:     Def2 = [{name, Tab}, {access_mode, read_only}],
 1226:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def2)),
 1227:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [nok])),
 1228: 
 1229:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1230:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1231: 
 1232:     Def3 = [{name, Tab}, {mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1233: 			  [Node1, Node2]},
 1234: 	    {access_mode, read_write}],
 1235:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def3)),
 1236:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [ok])),
 1237:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_only)),
 1238:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
 1239:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
 1240:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1241:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1242: 
 1243:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _, _}},
 1244: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, strange_atom)),
 1245:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1246: 
 1247:     ?match({aborted, {no_exists, _}}, 
 1248: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode(err_tab, read_only)),
 1249:     ?match({aborted, {no_exists, _}}, 
 1250: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode([Tab], read_only)),
 1251:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1252: 
 1253: change_table_load_order(suite) -> [];
 1254: change_table_load_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1255:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1256:     Tab1 = load_order_tab1,
 1257:     Tab2 = load_order_tab2,
 1258:     Tab3 = load_order_tab3,
 1259: 
 1260:     Def = case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1261: 	      true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}]; 
 1262: 	      false ->		  
 1263: 		  [{ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1264: 		   {disc_copies, [Node2]},
 1265: 		   {disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
 1266: 	  end,
 1267:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def)),
 1268:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def)),
 1269:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def)),
 1270: 
 1271:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab1, should_be_integer)),       
 1272:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(err_tab, 5)),       
 1273:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order([err_tab], 5)),       
 1274:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab1, 5)),       
 1275:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab2, 4)),    
 1276:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab3, 73)),
 1277: 
 1278:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(schema, -32)),   
 1279: 
 1280:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1281: 
 1282: set_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1283: set_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1284:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1285:     Tab1 = master_node_tab1,
 1286:     Tab2 = master_node_tab2,
 1287:     Tab3 = master_node_tab3,
 1288:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1289:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [Node2, Node3]}],
 1290:     Def3 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node3, Node1]}],
 1291:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1292:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1293:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1294: 
 1295:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(schema, ['hopefully@non.existing.node'])),
 1296:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(badtab, [Node2, Node3])),
 1297:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node3])),
 1298:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1299: 
 1300:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(schema, [Node3, Node1])),
 1301:     ?match([Node3, Node1], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1302:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node2])),
 1303:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1304:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node2, Node1])),
 1305:     ?match([Node2, Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1306:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [Node2])),  % Should set where_to_read to Node2!
 1307:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1308:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [Node3])),
 1309:     ?match([Node3], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1310:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [])),
 1311:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1312: 
 1313:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node1])),
 1314:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1315:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1316:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1317:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1318: 
 1319:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node1, Node2])),
 1320:     ?match([Node1, Node2], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1321:     ?match([Node1, Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1322:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1323:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1324: 
 1325:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1326: 
 1327: offline_set_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1328: offline_set_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1329:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1330:     Tab1 = offline_master_node_tab1,
 1331:     Tab2 = offline_master_node_tab2,
 1332:     Tab3 = offline_master_node_tab3,
 1333:     Tabs = ?sort([Tab1, Tab2, Tab3]),
 1334:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node]}],
 1335:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [Node]}],
 1336:     Def3 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node]}],
 1337:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1338:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1339:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1340:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1341:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1342: 
 1343:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node])),
 1344:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [Node])),
 1345:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [Node])),
 1346:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1347:     ?match(Tabs, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables))),
 1348: 
 1349:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1350:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [])),
 1351:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [])),
 1352:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [])),
 1353:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1354:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1355: 
 1356:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1357:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node])),
 1358:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1359:     AllTabs = ?sort([schema | Tabs]),
 1360:     ?match(AllTabs, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables))),
 1361: 
 1362:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1363:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([])),
 1364:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1365:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1366: 
 1367:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1368: 
 1369: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1370: %% Synchronize table with log or disc
 1371: %%
 1372: 
 1373: %% Dump ram tables on disc
 1374: dump_tables(suite) -> [];
 1375: dump_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1376:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1377:     Tab = dump_tables,
 1378:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
 1379:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1380: 
 1381:     %% Dump 10 records
 1382:     Size = 10,
 1383:     Keys = lists:seq(1, Size),
 1384:     Records = [{Tab, A, 7} || A <- Keys],
 1385:     lists:foreach(fun(Rec) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec)) end, Records),
 1386: 
 1387:     AllKeys = fun() -> ?sort(mnesia:all_keys(Tab)) end,
 1388: 
 1389:     ?match({atomic, Keys}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1390:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
 1391: 
 1392:     %% Delete one record
 1393:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab, 5})),
 1394:     Keys2 = lists:delete(5, Keys),
 1395: 
 1396:     ?match({atomic, Keys2}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1397: 
 1398:     %% Check that all 10 is restored after a stop
 1399:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1, Node2])),
 1400:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1, Node2])),
 1401:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], infinity)),
 1402: 
 1403:     ?match({atomic, Keys}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1404: 
 1405:     ?match({aborted,Reason} when element(1, Reason) == no_exists,
 1406:            mnesia:dump_tables([foo])),
 1407:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1408: 
 1409: dump_log(suite) -> [];
 1410: dump_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1411:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1412:     Tab = dump_log,
 1413:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1414:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1415:     Tab1 = dump_log1,
 1416:     Schema1 = [{name, Tab1}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_copies, [Node1]}],
 1417:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema1)),
 1418:     Tab2 = dump_log2,
 1419:     Schema2 = [{name, Tab2}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
 1420:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema2)),
 1421: 
 1422:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, ok})),
 1423:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, 1, ok})),
 1424:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, 1, ok})),
 1425: 
 1426:     ?match(dumped, mnesia:dump_log()),
 1427:     ?match(dumped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dump_log, [])),
 1428: 
 1429:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
 1430:     ?match(dumped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dump_log, [])),
 1431: 
 1432:     Self = self(),
 1433:     spawn(fun() -> dump_log(100, Self) end),
 1434:     spawn(fun() -> dump_log(100, Self) end),
 1435: 
 1436:     ?match(ok, receive finished -> ok after 3000 -> timeout end),
 1437:     ?match(ok, receive finished -> ok after 3000 -> timeout end),
 1438:     
 1439:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1440: 
 1441: dump_log(N, Tester) when N > 0 ->
 1442:     mnesia:dump_log(),
 1443:     dump_log(N-1, Tester);
 1444: dump_log(_, Tester) ->
 1445:     Tester ! finished.
 1446: 
 1447: 
 1448: wait_for_tables(doc) -> 
 1449:     ["Intf. test of wait_for_tables, see also force_load_table"];
 1450: wait_for_tables(suite) -> [];
 1451: wait_for_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1452:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1453:     Tab = wf_tab,
 1454:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1455:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1456:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], infinity)),
 1457:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([], timer:seconds(5))),
 1458:     ?match({timeout, [bad_tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([bad_tab], timer:seconds(5))),
 1459:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], 0)),
 1460:     ?match({error,_}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], -1)),
 1461:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1462: 
 1463: force_load_table(suite) -> [];
 1464: force_load_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1465:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1466:     Tab = wf_tab,
 1467: 
 1468:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1469:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1470:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
 1471:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
 1472:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 1, test_nok}])),
 1473:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
 1474:     %%    timer:sleep(timer:seconds(5)),
 1475:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
 1476:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], 5)),
 1477:     ?match({'EXIT', _}, mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
 1478:     ?match(yes, mnesia:force_load_table(Tab)),
 1479:     ?match([{Tab, 1, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
 1480: 
 1481:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:force_load_table(error_tab)),
 1482:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
 1483: 
 1484: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1485: 
 1486: user_properties(doc) ->
 1487:     ["Test of reading, writing and deletion of user properties",
 1488:      "Plus initialization of user properties when a table is created",
 1489:      "Do also test mnesia:table_info(Tab, user_properties)"];
 1490: user_properties(suite) -> [];
 1491: user_properties(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1492:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1493:     Tab1 = user_properties_1,
 1494:     Tab2 = user_properties_2,
 1495:     Tab3 = user_properties_3,
 1496:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node]}, {user_properties, []}],
 1497:     Def2 = [{mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config), [Node]}],
 1498:     Def3 = [{mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_only_copies, Config), [Node]}, 
 1499: 	    {user_properties, []}],
 1500: 
 1501:     PropKey = my_prop,
 1502:     Prop = {PropKey, some, elements},
 1503:     Prop2 = {PropKey, some, other, elements},
 1504:     YourProp= {your_prop},
 1505:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1506:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1507:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1508: 
 1509:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, user_properties)),
 1510:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, user_properties)),
 1511:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, user_properties)),
 1512: 
 1513:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab1, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1514: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1515:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab2, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1516: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1517:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab3, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1518: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1519: 
 1520:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, Prop)),
 1521:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, Prop)),
 1522:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, Prop)),
 1523:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, YourProp)),
 1524:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, YourProp)),
 1525:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, YourProp)),
 1526: 
 1527:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1528:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1529:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1530: 
 1531:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, Prop2)),
 1532:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, Prop2)),
 1533:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, Prop2)),
 1534:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1535:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1536:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1537: 
 1538:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1539:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1540:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1541: 
 1542:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, user_properties)),
 1543:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, user_properties)),
 1544:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, user_properties)),
 1545: 
 1546:     Tab4 = user_properties_4,
 1547:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1548: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab4, [{user_properties, [Prop]}])),
 1549: 
 1550:     ?match([Prop], mnesia:table_info(Tab4, user_properties)),
 1551: 
 1552:     %% Some error cases
 1553: 
 1554:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab1, {}}},
 1555: 	   mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, {})),
 1556:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab1, ali}},
 1557: 	   mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, ali)),
 1558: 
 1559:     Tab5 = user_properties_5,
 1560:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, {}}}}, 
 1561: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, {}}])),
 1562:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, ali}}}, 
 1563: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, ali}])),
 1564:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, [{}]}}}, 
 1565: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, [{}]}])),
 1566:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, [ali]}}}, 
 1567: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, [ali]}])),
 1568: 
 1569:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1570: 
 1571: 
 1572: unsupp_user_props(doc) ->
 1573:     ["Simple test of adding user props in a schema_transaction"];
 1574: unsupp_user_props(suite) -> [];
 1575: unsupp_user_props(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1576:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1577:     Tab1 = silly1,
 1578:     Tab2 = silly2,
 1579:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 1580: 
 1581:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1582: 				  create_table, [Tab1, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
 1583:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1584: 				  create_table, [Tab2, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
 1585: 
 1586:     F1 = fun() ->
 1587: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1588: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1}),
 1589: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1590: 		   silly2, {prop, propval2}), % same key as above
 1591: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1592: 		   schema, {prop, propval3})  % same key as above
 1593: 	 end,
 1594:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_schema,
 1595: 				  schema_transaction, [F1])),
 1596: 
 1597:     ?match([{prop,propval1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1598: 				       table_info, [silly1, user_properties])),
 1599:     ?match([{prop,propval2}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1600: 				       table_info, [silly2, user_properties])),
 1601:     ?match([_,{prop,propval3}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1602: 				       table_info, [schema, user_properties])),
 1603: 
 1604:     F2 = fun() ->
 1605: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1606: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1a}),
 1607: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1608: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1b})  % same key as above
 1609: 	 end,
 1610:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_schema,
 1611: 				  schema_transaction, [F2])),
 1612: 
 1613:     ?match([{prop,propval1b}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1614: 					table_info,
 1615: 					[silly1, user_properties])),
 1616:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
 1617: 
 1618: 
 1619: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1620: 
 1621: 
 1622: snmp_open_table(suite) -> [];
 1623: snmp_open_table(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1624:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1625:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1626: 
 1627:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1628:     Def1 = 
 1629: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1630: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1631: 	    false ->		
 1632: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1633: 	end,
 1634: 
 1635:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1636:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1637:     ErrTab = non_existing_tab,
 1638:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1639:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1640:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1641:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1642:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(ErrTab, [{key, integer}])),
 1643:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1644: 
 1645: snmp_close_table(suite) -> [];
 1646: snmp_close_table(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1647:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1648:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1649:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1650:     Def1 = 
 1651: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1652: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1653: 	    false ->		
 1654: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1655: 	end,
 1656: 
 1657:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1658:     Def2 = [{snmp, [{key, integer}]}, {Storage, [Node2]}],
 1659:     ErrTab = non_existing_tab,
 1660:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1661:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1662:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(no_snmp_tab, [])),
 1663:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 3),    
 1664:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),    
 1665:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 5),    
 1666:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(Tab1)),
 1667: 
 1668:     Transform = fun(Tab, Key) ->
 1669: 			[{T,K,V}] = mnesia:read(Tab, Key, write),
 1670: 			mnesia:delete(T,K, write),
 1671: 			mnesia:write({T, {K,K}, V, 43+V})
 1672: 		end,
 1673:     
 1674:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab1, ignore, [key,val,new])),
 1675:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1676: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
 1677: 				      mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab1),
 1678: 				      Keys = mnesia:select(Tab1, [{{'_','$1','_'}, [],
 1679: 								   ['$1']}]),
 1680: 				      [Transform(Tab1, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 1681: 				      ok
 1682: 			      end)),
 1683:     ?match([{Tab1, {1, 1}, 1, 44}], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab1, {1, 1})),
 1684:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key,{integer,integer}}])),
 1685: 
 1686:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(Tab2)),
 1687:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab2, ignore, [key,val,new])),
 1688:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1689: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
 1690: 				      mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab2),
 1691: 				      Keys = mnesia:select(Tab2, [{{'_','$1','_'}, [],
 1692: 								   ['$1']}]),
 1693: 				      [Transform(Tab2, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 1694: 				      ok
 1695: 			      end)),
 1696:     
 1697:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key,{integer,integer}}])), 
 1698:     
 1699:     %% Should be aborted ????
 1700:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(no_snmp_tab)),
 1701:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(ErrTab)),
 1702:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1703: 
 1704: snmp_get_next_index(suite) -> [];
 1705: snmp_get_next_index(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1706:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1707:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1708:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1709:     Def1 = 
 1710: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1711: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1712: 	    false ->		
 1713: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1714: 	end,
 1715: 
 1716:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1717:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1718:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1719:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1720:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1721:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1722:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1),
 1723:     Test = 
 1724: 	fun() ->
 1725: 		%% Test local tables
 1726: 		{success, Res11} = ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1727: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1728: 		{success, _Res12} = 
 1729: 		    ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, Index11)),
 1730: 		?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, endOfTable)),
 1731: 
 1732: 		%% Test external table
 1733: 		{success, Res21} =
 1734: 		    ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1735: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1736: 		{success, _Res22} = 
 1737: 		    ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, Index21)),
 1738: 
 1739: 		{ok, Row} = mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, Index11),		
 1740: 		?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete(Tab1, hd(Index11))),
 1741: 
 1742: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1743: 
 1744: 		ok = mnesia:dirty_write(Row), %% Reset to coming tests
 1745: 
 1746: 		%% Test of non existing table
 1747: 		%%?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(ErrTab, [])),
 1748: 		ok
 1749: 	end,
 1750:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1751:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1752:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1753:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1754: 
 1755:     %%io:format("**********Before ~p~n", [mnesia_lib:val({Tab1,snmp})]),
 1756:     %%io:format(" ~p ~n", [ets:tab2list(mnesia_lib:val({local_snmp_table,{index,snmp}}))]),
 1757:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1758:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1759:     %%io:format("**********After ~p~n", [mnesia_lib:val({Tab1,snmp})]),
 1760:     %%io:format(" ~p ~n", [ets:tab2list(mnesia_lib:val({local_snmp_table,{index,snmp}}))]),
 1761: 
 1762:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1763:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1764:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1765:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1766: 
 1767:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1768: 
 1769: add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, N) ->
 1770:     Recs1 = [{Tab1, I, I} || I <- lists:reverse(lists:seq(1, N))],
 1771:     Recs2 = [{Tab2, I, I} || I <- lists:reverse(lists:seq(20, 20+N-1))],
 1772:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> mnesia:dirty_write(R) end, Recs1),
 1773:     Fun = fun(R) -> mnesia:write(R) end,
 1774:     Trans = fun() -> lists:foreach(Fun, Recs2) end, 
 1775:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:transaction(Trans),
 1776:     %% Sync things, so everything gets everywhere!
 1777:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(lists:last(Recs1)) end),
 1778:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(lists:last(Recs2)) end),
 1779:     ?sort(Recs1 ++ Recs2).
 1780: 
 1781: snmp_get_row(suite) -> [];
 1782: snmp_get_row(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1783:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1784:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1785:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1786:     Def1 = 
 1787: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1788: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1789: 	    false ->		
 1790: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1791: 	end,
 1792:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1793:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1794:     Tab3 = snmp_table,
 1795:     Def3 = [{Storage, [Node1]}, 
 1796:             {attributes, [key, data1, data2]}],    
 1797: 
 1798:     Setup = fun() ->
 1799: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1800: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1801: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1802: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1803: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1804: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(
 1805: 					   Tab3, [{key, {fix_string,integer}}])),
 1806: 		    add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1)
 1807: 	    end,
 1808:     Clear = fun() ->
 1809: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab1)),
 1810: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)),
 1811: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab3))
 1812: 	    end,
 1813:     Test = 
 1814: 	fun() ->
 1815: 		%% Test local tables
 1816: 		{success, Res11} = 
 1817: 		    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1818: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1819: 		?match({ok, {Tab1,1,1}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, Index11)),    
 1820: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, Index11)),
 1821: 		?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, endOfTable)),
 1822: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [73])),
 1823: 		
 1824: 		Add = fun() ->  mnesia:write({Tab3, {"f_string", 3}, data1, data2}) end,
 1825: 		?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Add)),
 1826:                 {success, {ok, Index31}} = ?match({ok, RowIndex31} when is_list(RowIndex31), 
 1827: 						 mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab3,[])),
 1828: 		?match({ok, Row31} when is_tuple(Row31), 
 1829: 					mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, Index31)),
 1830: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab3, Index31)),
 1831: 		Del = fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab3,{"f_string",3}}) end,
 1832: 		?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Del)),
 1833: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, "f_string" ++ [3])),
 1834: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, "f_string" ++ [73])),
 1835: 
 1836:                 %% Test external table
 1837:                 {success, Res21} = ?match({ok,[20]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1838: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1839:                 ?match({ok, Row2} when is_tuple(Row2), mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab2, Index21)), 
 1840:                 ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, Index21)),
 1841:                 %% Test of non existing table
 1842:                 %% ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(ErrTab, [])),
 1843:                 ok
 1844: 	end,
 1845:     Setup(),
 1846:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1847:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1848:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1849:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1850:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1851:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1852:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1853: 
 1854:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1855:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1856:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1857:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1858:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1859:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1860:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1861:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1862: 
 1863:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1864: 
 1865: snmp_get_mnesia_key(suite) -> [];
 1866: snmp_get_mnesia_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1867:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1868:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1869:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1870:     Def1 = 
 1871: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1872: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1873: 	    false ->		
 1874: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1875: 	end,
 1876: 
 1877:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1878:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1879: 
 1880:     Tab3 = fix_string,    
 1881:     Setup = fun() -> 
 1882: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1883: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1884: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def1)),
 1885: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1886: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1887: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab3, [{key, {fix_string,integer}}])),
 1888: 
 1889: 		    add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1)	    
 1890: 	    end,
 1891:     Clear = fun() ->
 1892: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab1)),
 1893: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)),
 1894: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab3))
 1895: 	    end,
 1896:     Test = 
 1897: 	fun() ->
 1898: 		%% Test local tables
 1899: 		{success, Res11} = 
 1900: 		    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1901: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1902: 		?match({ok, 1}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, Index11)),    
 1903: 		%% Test external tables
 1904: 		{success, Res21} =
 1905: 		    ?match({ok, [20]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1906: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1907: 		?match({ok, 20}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, Index21)),
 1908: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, [97])),
 1909: 		?match({'EXIT', _}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, 97)),
 1910: 
 1911: 		?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab1,1}) end)),
 1912: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, Index11)),
 1913: 		
 1914: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab1,73,7}) end)),
 1915: 		?match({ok, 73}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, [73])),
 1916: 		?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab1,73}) end)),
 1917: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, [73])),
 1918: 
 1919: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab3,{"S",5},7}) end)),
 1920: 		?match({ok,{"S",5}}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab3, [$S,5])),
 1921: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab3,{"S",5}}) end)),
 1922: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab3, [$S,5])),
 1923: 
 1924: 		ok
 1925: 	end,
 1926:     Setup(),
 1927:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1928:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1929:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1930:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1931:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1932:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1933:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1934:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1935: 
 1936: snmp_update_counter(doc) ->
 1937:     ["Verify that counters may be updated for tables with SNMP property"];
 1938: snmp_update_counter(suite) -> [];
 1939: snmp_update_counter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1940:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1941:     Tab = snmp_update_counter,
 1942:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1943:            {snmp, [{key, integer}]},
 1944:            {ram_copies, [Node1]}
 1945:           ],
 1946:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1947:     Oid = {Tab, 1},
 1948:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1949:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 1})),
 1950:     ?match([{Tab, _Key, 1}], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1951:     ?match(3, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(Oid, 2)),
 1952:     ?match([{Tab, _Key, 3}], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1953:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1954: 
 1955: snmp_order(doc) ->
 1956:     ["Verify that sort order is correct in transactions and dirty variants"];
 1957: snmp_order(suite) -> [];
 1958: snmp_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1959:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1960:     Tab = snmp_order,
 1961:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1962:            {snmp, [{key, {integer, integer, integer}}]},
 1963:            {ram_copies, [Node1]}
 1964:           ],
 1965:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1966:     Oid = {Tab, 1},
 1967:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1968:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 1})),
 1969:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {A,B,2}, default}) ||
 1970: 	A <- lists:seq(1, 9, 2),
 1971: 	B <- lists:seq(2, 8, 2)],
 1972:     
 1973:     Test1 = fun() ->
 1974: 		    Keys0 = get_keys(Tab, []),
 1975: 		    ?match(Keys0, lists:sort(Keys0)),
 1976: 		    ?match([[1,2,2]|_], Keys0),
 1977: 		    Keys1 = get_keys(Tab, [5]),
 1978: 		    ?match(Keys1, lists:sort(Keys1)),
 1979: 		    ?match([[5,2,2]|_], Keys1),
 1980: 		    Keys2 = get_keys(Tab, [7, 4]),
 1981: 		    ?match(Keys2, lists:sort(Keys2)),
 1982: 		    ?match([[7,4,2]|_], Keys2),
 1983: 		    ok
 1984: 	    end,
 1985:     ?match(ok, Test1()),
 1986:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:transaction(Test1)),
 1987:     ?match(ok,mnesia:sync_dirty(Test1)),
 1988:    
 1989:     Test2 = fun() ->
 1990: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{0,0,2},updated}, write),
 1991: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{5,3,2},updated}, write),
 1992: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{10,10,2},updated}, write),
 1993: 		    Keys0 = get_keys(Tab, []),
 1994: 		    ?match([[0,0,2],[1,2,2]|_], Keys0),
 1995: 		    ?match(Keys0, lists:sort(Keys0)),
 1996: 		    
 1997: 		    Keys1 = get_keys(Tab, [5]),
 1998: 		    ?match([[5,2,2],[5,3,2]|_], Keys1),
 1999: 		    ?match(Keys1, lists:sort(Keys1)),
 2000: 		    
 2001: 		    Keys2 = get_keys(Tab, [7,4]),
 2002: 		    ?match([[7,4,2]|_], Keys2),
 2003: 		    ?match(Keys2, lists:sort(Keys2)),
 2004: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys0)),
 2005: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys1)),
 2006: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys2)),
 2007: 		    
 2008: 		    ?match([[10,10,2]], get_keys(Tab, [10])),
 2009: 		    ok
 2010: 	    end,
 2011: 
 2012:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:transaction(Test2)),
 2013: 
 2014:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2015: 
 2016: get_keys(Tab, Key) ->
 2017:     case mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab, Key) of
 2018: 	endOfTable -> [];
 2019: 	{ok, Next} ->
 2020: 	    [Next|get_keys(Tab, Next)]
 2021:     end.
 2022:

 2025: 
 2026: -record(tab, {i, e1, e2}).			% Simple test table
 2027: 
 2028: 
 2029: subscribe_extended(doc) ->
 2030:     ["Test the extended set of events, test with and without checkpoints. "];
 2031: subscribe_extended(suite) ->
 2032:     [];
 2033: subscribe_extended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2034:     [N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2035:     Tab1 = etab,
 2036:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 2037:     Def1 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2038:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 2039: 
 2040:     Tab2 = bag,
 2041:     Def2 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, 
 2042: 	    {type, bag},
 2043: 	    {record_name, Tab1},
 2044: 	    {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2045:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 2046: 
 2047:     Tab3 = ctab,
 2048:     Def3 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}],
 2049:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 2050: 
 2051:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2052:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),
 2053:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab3, detailed})),
 2054: 
 2055:     ?match({error, {already_exists, _}}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, simple})),
 2056:     ?match({error, {badarg, {table, Tab1, bad}}}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, bad})),
 2057: 
 2058:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2059:     test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3),
 2060:     
 2061:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe(activity)),
 2062:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2063:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab1)),
 2064:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, schema, {schema, Tab1}, [{schema, Tab1, _}],_}}, recv_event()),
 2065:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, schema, {schema, Tab1, _}, [], _}}, recv_event()),
 2066: 
 2067:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab2)),
 2068:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, schema, {schema, Tab2}, [{schema, Tab2, _}],_}}, 
 2069: 	   recv_event()),
 2070:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, schema, {schema, Tab2, _}, [], _}}, recv_event()),
 2071: 
 2072:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),    
 2073:     {ok, _, _} = mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name, testing}, 
 2074: 					     {ram_overrides_dump, true}, 
 2075: 					     {max, [Tab1, Tab2]}]),
 2076:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),
 2077:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2078:     test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3),
 2079: 
 2080:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2081: 
 2082: test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3) ->
 2083:     %% The basics 
 2084:     Rec1 = {Tab1, 1, 0, 0},
 2085:     Rec2 = {Tab1, 1, 1, 0},
 2086:     Rec3 = {Tab1, 2, 1, 0},
 2087:     Rec4 = {Tab1, 2, 2, 0},
 2088: 
 2089:     Write  = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2090: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2091: 					end) 
 2092: 	     end,
 2093:     Delete = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2094: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2095: 					end) 
 2096: 	     end,
 2097:     DelObj = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2098: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2099: 					end) 
 2100: 	     end,
 2101: 
 2102:     S = self(),
 2103:     D = {dirty, self()},
 2104:     %% SET 
 2105:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
 2106:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec1, [], D}}, recv_event()), 
 2107:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec3)),
 2108:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec3, [], D}}, recv_event()),    
 2109:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
 2110:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec1, [Rec1], D}}, recv_event()),
 2111:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab1, Rec2)),
 2112:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec2, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2113:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2114:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab1, 2})),
 2115:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, {Tab1, 2}, [Rec3], D}}, recv_event()),
 2116:     ?match({atomic, ok}, DelObj(Tab1, Rec2)),
 2117:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, Rec2, [Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2118:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2119: 
 2120:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab1, 1)),
 2121:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, {Tab1, 1}, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2122:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2123:     ?match({ok, _N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2124: 
 2125:     %% BAG 
 2126: 
 2127:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec1)),
 2128:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec1, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2129:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2130:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec4)),
 2131:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec4, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2132:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2133:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec3)),
 2134:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec3, [Rec4], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2135:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2136:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec2)),
 2137:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec2, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2138:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2139:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec1)),
 2140:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec1, [Rec1, Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2141:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2142:     ?match({atomic, ok}, DelObj(Tab2, Rec2)),
 2143:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, Rec2, [Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2144:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2145:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab2, 1)),
 2146:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, {Tab2, 1}, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2147:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2148:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab2, 2)),
 2149:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, {Tab2, 2}, [Rec4, Rec3], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2150:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2151: 
 2152:     %% COUNTERS
 2153: 
 2154:     Rec5 = {Tab3, counter, 0},
 2155:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec5)),
 2156:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab3, Rec5, [], D}}, recv_event()),
 2157:     ?match(1, mnesia:dirty_update_counter({Tab3, counter}, 1)),
 2158:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab3, {Tab3,counter,1}, [Rec5], D}}, recv_event()),
 2159:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab3, counter})),
 2160:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab3, {Tab3,counter},
 2161: 				 [{Tab3,counter,1}], D}}, recv_event()),
 2162:     ok.
 2163:
