 2165: subscribe_standard(doc) ->
 2166:     ["Tests system events and the original table events"];
 2167: subscribe_standard(suite) -> [];
 2168: subscribe_standard(Config) when is_list(Config)-> 
 2169:     [N1, N2]=?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2170:     Tab = tab,
 2171: 
 2172:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 2173:     Def = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2174: 
 2175:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 2176: 
 2177:     %% Check system events
 2178:     ?match({error, {badarg, foo}}, mnesia:unsubscribe(foo)),
 2179:     ?match({error, badarg}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, foo})),
 2180:     mnesia:unsubscribe(activity),
 2181: 
 2182:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2183:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2184: 
 2185:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 2186:     ?match({mnesia_system_event, {mnesia_down, N2}}, recv_event()),
 2187:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2188: 
 2189:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [Tab])),
 2190:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2191:     ?match({mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_up, N2}}, recv_event()),
 2192: 
 2193:     ?match(true, lists:member(self(), mnesia:system_info(subscribers))),
 2194:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
 2195:     timer:sleep(500),
 2196:     mnesia_test_lib:flush(),
 2197:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1], [Tab])),
 2198:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2199: 
 2200:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2201:     ?match({error, {already_exists, system}}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2202:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2203:     ?match({mnesia_system_event, {mnesia_down, N1}}, recv_event()),
 2204:     ?match({error, {node_not_running, N1}}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2205:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1, N2], [Tab])),
 2206: 
 2207:     %% Check table events
 2208:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2209:     Old_Level = mnesia:set_debug_level(trace),
 2210:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2211: 
 2212:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 2213: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#tab{i=155}) end)),
 2214:     Self = self(),
 2215:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2216:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid, _, Self}}}, recv_event()),
 2217: 
 2218:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table,Tab})),
 2219:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe(activity)),
 2220: 
 2221:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 2222: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#tab{i=255}) end)),
 2223:     
 2224:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2225:     mnesia:set_debug_level(Old_Level),
 2226: 
 2227:     %% Check deletion of replica
 2228: 
 2229:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2230:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2231:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=355})),
 2232:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2233:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, N1)),
 2234:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2235:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=455})),
 2236:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2237: 
 2238:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N2, N1)),
 2239:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2240:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2241:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=555})),
 2242:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2243:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N1, N2)),
 2244:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2245:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=655})),
 2246:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2247: 
 2248:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, N1, ram_copies)),
 2249:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2250:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2251:     ?match({error, {already_exists, {table,Tab, simple}}}, 
 2252: 	   mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2253:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=755})),
 2254:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2255: 
 2256:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 2257:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2258:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2259: 
 2260:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1]),
 2261: 
 2262:     ?verify_mnesia([N2], [N1]).
 2263: 
 2264: recv_event() ->
 2265:     receive
 2266: 	Event -> Event
 2267:     after 1000 -> 
 2268: 	    timeout
 2269:     end.
 2270:

 2273: 
 2274: foldl(suite) ->
 2275:     [];
 2276: foldl(doc) ->
 2277:     [""];
 2278: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2279:     Nodes = [_N1, N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2280:     Tab1 = fold_local,
 2281:     Tab2 = fold_remote,
 2282:     Tab3 = fold_ordered, 
 2283:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
 2284:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, [{ram_copies, [N2]}, {type, bag}])),
 2285:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2286: 						    {type, ordered_set}])),    
 2287: 
 2288:     Tab1Els = [{Tab1, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2289:     Tab2Els = ?sort([{Tab2, 1, 2} | [{Tab2, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]]),
 2290:     Tab3Els = [{Tab3, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2291: 
 2292:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab1Els],
 2293:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab2Els],
 2294:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab3Els],
 2295: 
 2296:     Fold = fun(Tab) ->
 2297: 		   lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end, [], Tab))
 2298: 	   end,
 2299:     Fold2 = fun(Tab, Lock) ->
 2300: 		    lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end, [], Tab, Lock))
 2301: 	    end,    
 2302:     Exit = fun(Tab) ->
 2303: 		   lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(_E, _A) -> exit(testing) end, [], Tab))
 2304: 	   end,
 2305:     %% Errors 
 2306:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Fold, [error])),
 2307:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(fun(Tab) -> mnesia:foldl(badfun,[],Tab) end,
 2308: 					    [Tab1])),    
 2309:     ?match({aborted, testing}, mnesia:transaction(Exit, [Tab1])), 
 2310:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, read_lock])),
 2311: 
 2312:     %% Success
 2313:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab1]))),
 2314:     ?match({atomic, Tab2Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab2]))),
 2315:     ?match({atomic, Tab3Els}, mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab3])),        
 2316: 
 2317:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, read]))),
 2318:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, write]))),
 2319: 
 2320:     ?match(Tab1Els, sort_res(mnesia:sync_dirty(Fold, [Tab1]))),
 2321:     ?match(Tab2Els, sort_res(mnesia:async_dirty(Fold, [Tab2]))),
 2322: 
 2323:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).	   
 2324: 
 2325: sort_res({atomic, List}) ->
 2326:     {atomic, ?sort(List)};
 2327: sort_res(Else) when is_list(Else) ->
 2328:     ?sort(Else);
 2329: sort_res(Else) ->
 2330:     Else.
 2331: 
 2332: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

 2336:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2337:     ?match(ok, mnesia:info()),
 2338:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2339:

 2344:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).

 2350:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [])),

 2354: view_0(suite) -> [];

 2356:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2357:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view()),

 2359: 
 2360: view_1(suite) -> [];
 2361: view_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2362:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2363:     BinCore = mnesia_lib:mkcore({crashinfo, "Just testing..."}),
 2364:     CoreFile = lists:concat(["MnesiaCore.", node(), ".view_1.", ?MODULE]),
 2365:     ?match(ok, file:write_file(CoreFile, BinCore)),
 2366:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(CoreFile)),
 2367:     ?match(ok, file:delete(CoreFile)),
 2368: 
 2369:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2370:     Dir = mnesia:system_info(directory),
 2371:     ?match(eof, mnesia_lib:view(filename:join(Dir, "LATEST.LOG"))),
 2372:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(filename:join(Dir, "schema.DAT"))),
 2373:     ?verify_mnesia([], Nodes).
 2374: 
 2375: view_2(suite) -> [];
 2376: view_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2377:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2378:     BinCore = mnesia_lib:mkcore({crashinfo, "More testing..."}),
 2379:     File = lists:concat([?MODULE, "view_2.", node()]),
 2380:     ?match(ok, file:write_file(File, BinCore)),
 2381:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(File, core)),
 2382:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2383: 
 2384:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2385:     Dir = mnesia:system_info(directory),
 2386:     ?match(ok, file:rename(filename:join(Dir, "LATEST.LOG"), File)),
 2387:     ?match(eof, mnesia_lib:view(File, log)),
 2388:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2389: 
 2390:     ?match(ok, file:rename(filename:join(Dir, "schema.DAT"), File)),
 2391:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(File, dat)),
 2392:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2393:     ?verify_mnesia([], Nodes).
 2394: 
 2395: lkill(suite) -> [];
 2396: lkill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2397:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2398: 
 2399:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2400:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2401:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, lkill, [])),
 2402:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2403:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2404:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
 2405: 
 2406: kill(suite) -> [];
 2407: kill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2408:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2409: 
 2410:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2411:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2412:     ?match({_, []}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, kill, [])),
 2413:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2414:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2415:     ?verify_mnesia([], [Node1, Node2]).
 2416: 
 2417: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2418: 
 2419: 
 2420: 
 2421: record_name_dirty_access_ram(suite) ->
 2422:     [];
 2423: record_name_dirty_access_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2424:     record_name_dirty_access(ram_copies, Config).
 2425: 
 2426: record_name_dirty_access_disc(suite) ->
 2427:     [];
 2428: record_name_dirty_access_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2429:     record_name_dirty_access(disc_copies, Config).
 2430: 
 2431: record_name_dirty_access_disc_only(suite) ->
 2432:     [];
 2433: record_name_dirty_access_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2434:     record_name_dirty_access(disc_only_copies, Config).
 2435: 
 2436: record_name_dirty_access_xets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2437:     record_name_dirty_access(ext_ram_copies, Config).
 2438: 
 2439: 
 2440: record_name_dirty_access(Storage, Config) ->
 2441:     [Node1, _Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2442: 
 2443:     List = lists:concat([record_name_dirty_access_, Storage]),
 2444:     Tab = list_to_atom(List),
 2445:     RecName = some_record,
 2446:     Attr = val,
 2447:     TabDef = [{type, bag},
 2448: 	      {record_name, RecName},
 2449: 	      {index, [Attr]},
 2450: 	      {Storage, Nodes}],
 2451:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, TabDef)),
 2452: 
 2453:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
 2454: 
 2455:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 20})),
 2456:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21})),
 2457:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 22})),
 2458: 
 2459:     %% Backup test
 2460:     BupFile = List ++ ".BUP",
 2461:     CpName = cpname,
 2462:     CpArgs = [{name, CpName}, {min, [Tab]}, {ram_overrides_dump, true}],
 2463:     ?match({ok, CpName, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(CpArgs)),
 2464:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CpName, BupFile)),
 2465:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(CpName)),
 2466: 
 2467:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 1, 10})),
 2468:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab})),
 2469:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 3, 10})),
 2470: 
 2471:     Twos =?sort( [{RecName, 2, 20}, {RecName, 2, 21}, {RecName, 2, 22}]),
 2472:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2))),
 2473: 
 2474:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21})),
 2475: 
 2476:     Tens = ?sort([{RecName, 1, 10}, {RecName, 3, 10}]),
 2477:     TenPat = {RecName, '_', 10},
 2478:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_match_object(Tab, TenPat))),
 2479:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_select(Tab, [{TenPat, [], ['$_']}]))),
 2480: 
 2481:     %% Subscription test
 2482:     E = mnesia_table_event,
 2483:     ?match_receive({E, {write, {Tab, 3, 10}, _}}),
 2484:     ?match_receive({E, {delete_object, {Tab, 2, 21}, _}}),
 2485:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab})),
 2486: 
 2487:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1])),
 2488:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab])),
 2489: 
 2490:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(Tab, TenPat, Attr) )),
 2491:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 10, Attr))),
 2492: 
 2493:     ?match([1, 2, 3], ?sort(mnesia:dirty_all_keys(Tab))),
 2494: 
 2495:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab})),
 2496:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete(Tab, 2)),
 2497:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2)),
 2498: 
 2499:     ?match_receive({E, {delete, {Tab, 2}, _}}),
 2500:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:flush()),
 2501:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab})),
 2502: 
 2503:     %% Restore test
 2504:     ?match({atomic, [Tab]}, mnesia:restore(BupFile, [{recreate_tables, [Tab]}])),
 2505:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
 2506: 
 2507:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_match_object(Tab, mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern)))),
 2508:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_select(Tab, 
 2509: 					   [{mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern),
 2510: 					     [],['$_']}]))),
 2511: 
 2512:     %% Traverse backup test
 2513: 
 2514:     Fun = fun(Rec, {Good, Bad}) ->
 2515: 		  ?verbose("BUP: ~p~n", [Rec]),
 2516: 		  case Rec of
 2517: 		      {T, K, V} when T == Tab ->
 2518: 			  Good2 = Good ++ [{RecName, K, V}],
 2519: 			  {[Rec], {?sort(Good2), Bad}};
 2520: 		      {T, K} when T == Tab ->
 2521: 			  Good2 = [G || G <- Good, element(2, G) /= K],
 2522: 			  {[Rec], {?sort(Good2), Bad}};
 2523: 		      _ when element(1, Rec) == schema ->
 2524: 			  {[Rec], {Good, Bad}};
 2525: 		      _ ->
 2526: 			  Bad2 = Bad ++ [Rec],
 2527: 			  {[Rec], {Good, ?sort(Bad2)}}
 2528: 		  end
 2529:           end,
 2530: 
 2531:     ?match({ok, {Twos, []}}, mnesia:traverse_backup(BupFile, mnesia_backup, 
 2532: 						    dummy, read_only, 
 2533: 						    Fun, {[], []})),
 2534:     ?match(ok, file:delete(BupFile)),
 2535: 
 2536:     %% Update counter test
 2537: 
 2538:     CounterTab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Tab, "_counter"])),
 2539:     CounterTabDef = [{record_name, some_counter}],
 2540:     C = my_counter,
 2541:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(CounterTab, CounterTabDef)),
 2542:     ?match(some_counter, mnesia:table_info(CounterTab, record_name)),
 2543:     ?match(0, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, gurka, -10)),
 2544:     ?match(10, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 10)),
 2545:     ?match(11, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 1)),
 2546:     ?match(4711, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 4700)),
 2547:     ?match([{some_counter, C, 4711}], mnesia:dirty_read(CounterTab, C)),
 2548:     ?match(0, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, -4747)),
 2549: 
 2550:     %% Registry tests
 2551: 
 2552:     RegTab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Tab, "_registry"])),
 2553:     RegTabDef = [{record_name, some_reg}],
 2554:     ?match(ok, mnesia_registry:create_table(RegTab, RegTabDef)),
 2555:     ?match(some_reg, mnesia:table_info(RegTab, record_name)),
 2556:     {success, RegRecs} =
 2557: 	?match([_ | _], mnesia_registry_test:dump_registry(node(), RegTab)),
 2558: 
 2559:     R = ?sort(RegRecs),
 2560:     ?match(R, ?sort(mnesia_registry_test:restore_registry(node(), RegTab))),
 2561: 
 2562:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2563: 
 2564: sorted_ets(suite) ->
 2565:     [];
 2566: sorted_ets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2567:     [N1, N2, N3] = All = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 2568: 
 2569:     Tab = sorted_tab,    
 2570:     Def = case  mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 2571: 	      true ->  [{name, Tab}, {type, ordered_set}, {ram_copies, All}];
 2572: 	      false -> [{name, Tab}, {type, ordered_set},
 2573: 			{ram_copies, [N1]}, 
 2574: 			{disc_copies,[N2, N3]}]
 2575: 	  end,
 2576: 
 2577:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
 2578:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(fel, [{disc_only_copies, N1}])),
 2579: 
 2580:     ?match([ok | _], 
 2581: 	   [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {dirty, N}, N}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]),    
 2582:     ?match({atomic, _}, 
 2583: 	   mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() ->
 2584: 					   [mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, N}, N}) || 
 2585: 					       N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]
 2586: 				   end)),
 2587: 
 2588:     List = mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'}),
 2589:     ?match(List, ?sort(List)),
 2590:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2591:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2592: 
 2593:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(All),
 2594:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(All, [sorted_tab]),
 2595: 
 2596:     List = mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'}),
 2597:     ?match(List, ?sort(List)),
 2598:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2599:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2600: 
 2601:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_select, [Tab, [{{Tab, '_', '_'},[],['$_']}]])),
 2602: 
 2603:     TransMatch = fun() ->
 2604: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 0}, 0}),
 2605: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 11}, 11}),
 2606: 			 mnesia:match_object({Tab, '_', '_'})
 2607: 		 end,
 2608:     TransSelect = fun() ->
 2609: 			  mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 0}, 0}),
 2610: 			  mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 11}, 11}),
 2611: 			  mnesia:select(Tab, [{{Tab, '_', '_'},[],['$_']}])
 2612: 		  end,
 2613: 
 2614:     TList = mnesia:transaction(TransMatch),
 2615:     STList = ?sort(TList),
 2616:     ?match(STList, TList),
 2617:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [TransMatch])),
 2618:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, [TransMatch])),
 2619: 
 2620:     TSel = mnesia:transaction(TransSelect),
 2621:     ?match(STList, TSel),
 2622:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [TransSelect])),
 2623:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, [TransSelect])),
 2624: 
 2625:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(rec, [{type, ordered_set}])),
 2626:     [ok = mnesia:dirty_write(R) || R <- [{rec,1,1}, {rec,2,1}]],
 2627:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(rec, 3)),    
 2628:     TestIt = fun() ->
 2629: 		     ok = mnesia:write({rec,1,1}),
 2630: 		     mnesia:index_read(rec, 1, 3)
 2631: 	     end,
 2632:     ?match({atomic, [{rec,1,1}, {rec,2,1}]}, mnesia:transaction(TestIt)).
 2633: 
 2634: 
 2635: index_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2636:     [N1, N2] = All = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2637:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_set, [{type, set}, {ram_copies, [N1]}, {index, [val]},
 2638:                                                      {disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 2639:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_bag, [{type, bag}, {ram_copies, [N1]}, {index, [val]},
 2640:                                                      {disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 2641:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_oset, [{type, ordered_set}, {ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
 2642:                                                       {index, [val]}])),
 2643: 
 2644:     Tabs = [i_set, i_bag, i_oset],
 2645: 
 2646:     Add = fun(Tab) ->
 2647:                   Write = fun(Table) ->
 2648:                                   Recs = [{Table, N, N rem 5} || N <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 2649:                                   [ok = mnesia:write(Rec) || Rec <- Recs],
 2650:                                   Recs
 2651:                           end,
 2652:                   {atomic, Recs} = mnesia:sync_transaction(Write, [Tab]),
 2653:                   lists:sort(Recs)
 2654:           end,
 2655: 
 2656:     IRead = fun(Tab) ->
 2657:                     Read = fun(Table) ->
 2658:                                    [mnesia:index_read(Table, N, val) || N <- lists:seq(0,4)]
 2659:                            end,
 2660:                     {atomic, Recs} = mnesia:transaction(Read, [Tab]),
 2661:                     lists:sort(lists:flatten(Recs))
 2662:            end,
 2663: 
 2664:     Delete = fun(Rec) ->
 2665:                      Del = fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Rec) end,
 2666:                      {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(Del),
 2667:                      ok
 2668:              end,
 2669: 
 2670: 
 2671:     Recs = [Add(Tab) || Tab <- Tabs],
 2672:     ?match(Recs, [IRead(Tab) || Tab <- Tabs]),
 2673:     [Delete(Rec) || Rec <- lists:flatten(Recs)],
 2674: 
 2675:     [?match({Tab,0}, {Tab,mnesia:table_info(Tab, size)}) || Tab <- Tabs],
 2676: 
 2677:     [?match({Tab,Node,0, _}, rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, index_size, [Tab]))
 2678:      || Node <- All, Tab <- Tabs],
 2679:     ?verify_mnesia(All, []).
 2680: 
 2681: index_size(Tab) ->
 2682:     %% White box testing
 2683:     case mnesia:table_info(Tab, index_info) of
 2684:         {index, _, [{_, {ram, Ref}}=Dbg]} -> {Tab, node(), ets:info(Ref, size), Dbg};
 2685:         {index, _, [{_, {dets, Ref}}=Dbg]} -> {Tab, node(), dets:info(Ref, size), Dbg}
 2686:     end.
 2687: 
 2688: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2689: 
 2690: 
 2691: 
 2692: change_table_copy_type_node_down_allowed(suite) ->
 2693:     [];
 2694: change_table_copy_type_node_down_allowed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2695:     [N1, N2] = All = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2696: 
 2697:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab, [{ram_copies, All}])),
 2698: 
 2699:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 2700:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 2701: 
 2702:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(tab, N1, disc_copies)),
 2703: 
 2704:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 2705:     ?verify_mnesia(All, []),
 2706: 
 2707:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 2708:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 2709: 
 2710:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(tab, N1, disc_only_copies)),
 2711: 
 2712:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 2713:     ?verify_mnesia(All, []).
 2714: 
 2715: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2716: 
 2717: 
 2718: 
 2719: change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(suite) ->
 2720:     [];
 2721: change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2722:     %% built-in types <-> built-in types
 2723:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_copies, ram_copies),
 2724: 
 2725:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_only_copies, disc_copies),
 2726: 
 2727:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ram_copies, disc_only_copies),
 2728:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_only_copies, ram_copies),
 2729: 
 2730:     %% built-in types <-> ext_ram_copies
 2731:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ram_copies, ext_ram_copies),
 2732:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_ram_copies, ram_copies),
 2733: 
 2734:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_copies, ext_ram_copies),
 2735:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_ram_copies, disc_copies),
 2736: 
 2737:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_only_copies, ext_ram_copies),
 2738:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_ram_copies, disc_only_copies),
 2739: 
 2740:     %% built-in types <-> ext_disc_only_copies
 2741:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ram_copies, ext_disc_only_copies),
 2742:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_disc_only_copies, ram_copies),
 2743: 
 2744:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_copies, ext_disc_only_copies),
 2745:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_disc_only_copies, disc_copies),
 2746: 
 2747:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, disc_only_copies, ext_disc_only_copies),
 2748:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_disc_only_copies, disc_only_copies),
 2749: 
 2750:     %% ext_ram_copies <-> ext_disc_only_copies
 2751:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_ram_copies, ext_disc_only_copies),
 2752:     verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, ext_disc_only_copies, ext_ram_copies).
 2753: 
 2754: verify_change_table_copy_type_node_down_not_allowed(Config, From, To) ->
 2755:     [N1, N2] = All = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2756: 
 2757:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab, [{From, All}])),
 2758: 
 2759:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 2760:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 2761: 
 2762:     ?match({aborted, Reason} when element(1, Reason) == not_active, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(tab, N1, To)),
 2763: 
 2764:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 2765:     ?verify_mnesia(All, []).
